td.content: s:22 yr old female c/o 7 weeks h/o moderate leg pain. NKDA. denies any alcohol use Patient does not smoke o:Height 164 cm, Weight 54.8 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18, patient appears in stooped posture a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Naproxen - 250 mg po q 12h prn, and ordered Lumbar CT myelogram.

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate stiffness for 3 weeks. pt also reports moderate low back pain, moderate leg pain. she is a 23 YO f statistician. o:Height 164 cm, Weight 54.7 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, sensation: intact a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:white female statistician aged 23 yrs presents with moderate stiffness, moderate leg pain. she has history of moderate low back pain. o:Height 164 cm, Weight 54.3 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Extremities = femoral, popliteal and pedal pulses are full B/L, without any bruit, no edema, straight leg test (-) a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Lumbar CT myelogram.
